name: Rite of Passage: Heart of the Storm (Full)
name_original: Rite of Passage: Heart of the Storm (Full)
description:
Unlock the complete adventure with a single purchase! No in-app purchases!

Jump into the heart of the storm of the century, where a vengeful spirit has awakened from an ancient temple to wreak havoc on the weather. You’re on your way to help your friend, Professor Mann, but when your plane suddenly malfunctions, you’re forced to eject and parachute to safety. Can you find your friend and help him battle this strange phenomenon before it gets out of control?

• HELP THE PROFESSOR REPAIR HIS STORMCATCHER!
Is this a case of weather experimentation gone wrong? Or did Professor Mann just accidentally stumble upon a secret that’s been kept hidden for years?

• CAN YOU AVOID THE LIGHTNING?
Dodge the dangerous tempest through blustery hidden object scenes.

• USE YOUR SMART PHONE TO CRACK THE CASE
All the modern tools are at your fingertips to solve stormy puzzles and electrifying mini-games.

• PLAY A NEW ASHEN RISE ADVENTURE IN THE BONUS GAME
Continue this mysterious story and enjoy additional Collector’s Edition exclusives including collectible Storm Clouds, morphing objects, and more!
